prompts.question: What is your name (as it appears on your tax return)?
What is the name of your business (if applicable)?
What is your tax classification (e.g., individual/sole proprietor, C corporation, S corporation, partnership, trust/estate)?
If your business is an LLC, what is its tax classification (e.g., disregarded entity, partnership, corporation)?
If you selected 'Other' as your tax classification, please specify.
Do you qualify as an exempt payee under IRS regulations? If so, what is your exemption code (if any)?
Do you have any FATCA filing requirements? If so, what is your FATCA exemption code (if any)?
What city are you located in?
What state or province are you located in?
What is your ZIP code or postal code?
What are your account numbers (if applicable)?
What is the name and address of the requester?
What is your Social Security Number (SSN) (or Individual Taxpayer Identification Number ITIN) (if required)?
What is your Employer Identification Number (EIN) (if applicable)?
